name: Crypto Investment Research: Due Diligence in a New Paradigm
description: Crypto is a completely new asset class, unlike anything we've ever seen before. With that comes a completely different investment and research approach. Discover the research methods that are unique to this digital frontier.

speakers.name: Ren Yu Kong
speakers.bio: Ren is a research analyst at Blockworks Research. He spends his day deep in the weeds of DeFi and infrastructure while building out an institutional grade crypto research platform. Prior to this, he worked at several crypto hedge funds focusing on DeFi opportunities.
